text: GrylliniLaicharting (1781) Verzeichnis und Beschreibung der Tyroler Insecten 1. is a tribe of crickets (Orthoptera: Ensifera) and typical of the family Gryllidae. Species are terrestrial, carnivorous or omnivorous and can be found in all continenents except Antarctica.Orthoptera Species File (Version 5.0/5.0: retrieved 25 August 2019) ==Genera== The Orthoptera
